document.full_text: frequently, germany is a strong, conscious-shaping force on the international stage. but its voice has grown muted under guido westerwelle, its foreign minister. he and his nation need to speak up again.
document.title: letter from europe: a fine time for germany to speak up
lines_and_colors: frequently, germany is a strong, conscious-shaping force on the international stage. but its voice has grown muted under guido westerwelle, its foreign minister. he and his nation need to speak up again.
